about.title: About Sandra
about.intro: Passionate about understanding human behavior and social relationships. Over 15 years of experience helping people transform their lives through systemic consulting.

move.title: From Mexico to the U.S.
move.text: In 2018, I made the boldest decision of my life: leaving my country, my family and career behind to start anew in the U.S. It was challenging, but deeply transformative.

growth.title: Becoming a Stronger Professional
growth.text: Facing emotional and mental chaos helped me grow into a more empathetic and resilient consultant, able to connect with clients from diverse backgrounds.

beliefList: I honor my roots and I am the result of my story.
Say yes, then figure out how.
You have to be your own cheerleader.

Citizen and explorer of the world.
about.valuesText: Autonomy, community, commitment, clarity, empathy, professionalism.
about.missionText: To promote holistic well-being and guide individuals and organizations toward conscious, empowered living.
about.visionText: To be a trusted source of transformation for people around the world—helping them live with clarity and purpose.

contact.title: Book a Session
contact.subtitle: Let's connect. Fill out the form or reach me directly—I'm here to support you.

questions.a: Virtual sessions allow you to receive support without disrupting your daily routine. It's a convenient and efficient way to prioritize your mental and relational health.
Ideal for people with busy schedules or those living abroad. Sessions are designed for individuals, families, and couples looking for professional guidance in both English and Spanish.

questions.q: How can this help my company?
questions.a: Group workshops and business consulting can improve communication, reduce conflict, and foster a more collaborative and productive work environment.
